text:
I think it's nice to have this, especially for those with passion for plant, or for some educational walking experience.

However, beside just a path with plants and trees, identified but not explained, there is nothing else. It's also not very well maintained.

Put some educational signages, so that walker can learn more about medicinal vegetations, like basic information about what their healing purposes, distribution etc.

After all, it has one of the best slogan 'Plants that heal, thrill, or kill.'
